name: pm5.74da
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wb(w2, w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wi(w1, w2), wi(w1, w3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wb(w2, w3))

comment: Distribution of implication over biconditional (deduction form). Variant of ~ pm5.74d . (Contributed by NM, 4-May-2007.)
